author: Deleted User
content:
Hi all! 
I have been persistently trying to deploy couple contracts in the past days... Developed in remix, deployed with no problem on ropsten with everything being functional. 

When moving to local env and "truffle deploy"
I get this error: 
```
2_deploy.js
===========

/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/459.bundled.js:25541
        throw new Error("Could not find artifacts for " + import_path + " from any sources");
        ^

Error: Could not find artifacts for Token from any sources
    at Resolver.require (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/resolver/dist/lib/resolver.js:61:1)
```

I would highly appriciate any help, because I have been stuck locally with this error for days now.

author: akshay09125
content:
@here 

I am planning to build a mobile-first NFT marketplace. But I am running into an issue where I need to make the transaction from the mobile application (native ios) and mint the token. 

on the front end, We usually have Metamask, and the minting/payment process is really easy.

since I am building a native ios app there is no Metamask extension support. How can I mint and get the payment from the native mobile/backend?

author: thehacktivist
content:
Hey, guys need to discuss something related with EIP712 hashstructs
Consider what a normal hashStruct looks like 
```bytes32 public constant PERMIT_TYPEHASH = keccak256("Permit(address owner,address spender,uint256 value,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)");

bytes32 structHash = keccak256(abi.encode(PERMIT_TYPEHASH, owner, spender, rawAmount, nonces[owner]++, deadline));```

author: thehacktivist
